meanings.definition: A collection of photographs taken together.
meanings.sent1: I have a photoset of my family vacation.
meanings.sent2: She showed me her photoset from the wedding.
meanings.sent3: The photoset of funny cat pictures always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her photoset of nature shots is like a window to the world.
meanings.sent5: The photoset of old black-and-white photos was a trip down memory lane.

meanings.definition: To arrange or organize photographs into a set.
meanings.sent1: I need to photoset the pictures from the party.
meanings.sent2: She photosetted the images in chronological order.
meanings.sent3: He photosetted the photos in a creative pattern on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Photosetting the pictures felt like putting together a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: She carefully photoset the photos to create a beautiful display.
